name: SHAPE ZONE!
description:
Welcome to the SHAPE ZONE!

Can you match the 3 shapes in the SHAPE ZONE?! A twist on the classic match 3 genre, you must match a sequence of 3 shapes in real-time as shapes fill the board. If a column reaches the top, it's game over! Match the SHAPE ZONE sequence at the top of the screen, by moving shapes to the bottom sequence squares. You'll see and hear a notification that the correct shape has been selected for the SHAPE ZONE match. The higher the sequence timer is, the more points your match will make. Match sequences and combos to advance rounds and level up. Unlock new badges and titles as you progress. The longer you play the more challenging it gets with new shapes, faster board fills and new strategies will keep you on your toes to get to your highest score! 

Can you rule the SHAPE ZONE?!

Game made in collaboration with Flexagon Games.
